modName: Dual Sheath Redux for Insanitys Dragonbane
summary: Just a small mesh edit so it can be used with DSR.
descriptionHtml:
Just a small mesh edit so it can be used with DSR, no aditional ESP, just a small mesh mod.

[size=4]Requirements:[/size]
[size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19180/?]Insanitys Dragonbane[/url]
[/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34155/?]Dual Sheath Redux[/url]

author: Veya
